alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 28 at 5:52AM PDT until October 30 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing temperatures of 28 to 31 for a couple of hours. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley, San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Sunday morning. For the second Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley
